lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, welcome to tonight's episode. Before we get into it, we have some announcements to do really fast. First and foremost, getting to our fantastic sponsor for the evening. Returning: the glorious Loot Crate! Thank you so much, Loot Crate, for being fantastic and for being a sponsor for our show as long as you have! It's been awesome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hi, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you didn't throw it to me yet, did you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but I can. Hey, Sam. Why don't you tell us about our sponsor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, as I tell you guys-- Hey, crew. By the way, crew: as I tell you guys about Loot Crate, can you guys get a camera up here? I'm going to show some close-up things. Should have done that ahead of time. It's on its way. Okay. Loot Crate, the theme this week is Primal. Brands include X-Men, Overwatch, Predator, you can go to lootcrate.com/criticalrole and use the promo code CRITICALROLE for 10% off. And that's some severe savings. Just a few days left to catch this month's theme, so check it out. They're a great sponsor; we love them. They do so much for the show. We genuinely appreciate them. Okay, that being said-- and this will tie into Loot Crate, I promise-- I was thinking a lot this week about fan art. Are you on me? Whatever. Fan art.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where did that camera come from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I was like, "why should they get all the fun?" So I was like, "I'm going to do my own fan art "this week!" Because things people know about me, I'm a talented performer and all that stuff, but I'm also an emerging visual artist. And this is a chance to get my art out to the world. And so I'm going to present it right now. Guys, this is art, so if you have any kind of a reaction that's real-- if you cry, if you clap, whatever. I'll take it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man. Joma, your time is over!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to start with Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So good!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's pretty good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you really draw that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me see over here! Is that you? Did you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Magic marker on paper.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's actually pretty good, man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like I got his rage and his ferocity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm feeling it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next up, she's hard: Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty good!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did Keyleth. I should point out that all of these are signed and numbered by the artist.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have some fierce bone structure going.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're hard. Lot of things going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can see she's cast the 5th-level spell "Body to Forest."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't know how to draw bodies! So I just went with grass!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Druids don't shave pits, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Truth be told, I was drinking, so things get a little worse as we go. So, this is Percy! It's a lot of white. I don't know how to paint with white or use white.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To be fair, so is Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a white guy with white hair. I've got to work on this one. Next up, a guy who's near and dear to me. Here's Taryon Darrington. Little art tip here, guys: don't use blue pencil on blue paper because it tends not to show up. That's a free artist-to-artist tip for you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, you need to turn it back this way more. Oh, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is a drawing there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bold decisions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just blue pencil on blue paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like one of the Magic Eye pictures. You have to really focus to see it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I see a sailboat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then the rest was hardcore art. And I feel like I really captured him. He's got a flute. He's got poop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love that you broke rule number one of Pictionary and labeled things!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably go a little wider because these will be side-by-side, all right? So you can really get the artistry. Okay, here they are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one's which? (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some may argue that I photocopied Vax and put pink ribbons in her hair to be Vex. Some could argue that, and they would be correct. But you can also tell them apart because he's got a knife and she's got a little bow and arrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are those arrows green?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I ran out of a lot of things, and I was drinking pretty heavily at this point, so I was probably fully drunk at this point. And then last, but not least. I mean, all together, I'd say probably an hour and a half it took me to do all these, including the CVS run. And last but not least, I'm most proud of Pike Trickfoot, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now, again, you could say that I printed out her IMDB page and colored it in, and you'd be right, but it is also art, and I will stick by that. Now here's how this all ties into Loot Crate, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It tied into The Dark Knight in that particular image.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will, like a lottery, pick one at random to win all of this art signed by the artist. One-of-a-kind pieces that will certainly go up in value-- maybe even before I die! They will be worth a lot of money. And these are all going to a fabulous art collector out there. Thank you, Loot Crate! Thank you, artists! And that's it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Happy St. Pat's. That's the end of the episode, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can pass them around. Share them, show them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When did you do these? Last night?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it was after you left my house last night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you serious? We left at midnight!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it was eleven-something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it my imagination that all of the half-elves kind of have the same weird chin thing going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's consistent!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will also say that I definitely get Ashley as the Joker threatening the city.

lines.name: SAM, MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Millions will die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why the pink lipstick, man?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's what girls wear!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you ever seen Ashley wear pink lipstick?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep. Girls wear pink lipstick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Although I appreciate her guns and her biceps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's a monstah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's like if The Joker had a daughter with Krondor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, Sam, and thank you, Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Loot Crate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's that hashtag again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: #BrianFosterSmellsLikeCabbage

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there we go. Remember that, guys. All right, merch update. Same old, same old, I'm pretty sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Merch update! There's merch still in the store!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. You've got stickers, mugs, patches, bracelets, stuff like that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All that stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Logo shirts and the disturbingly comfortable "How do you want to do this?" hoodies up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: WonderCon! We're going to be at WonderCon doing a live Talks Machina panel on Saturday, April 1st from 2-3 PM Pacific at the arena at the Anaheim Convention Center. The big room. So fill it, Critters! Come on in! We have plenty of room and space for you guys. We want to try to show the convention that we are legion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not an April Fools' joke!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're actually going to be there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is legit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is an April Fools' joke.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They gave us the big room and went, "You can't fill this," and we're like, "Yeah, we can." So we're trying to prove to them that we can fill the room. Come and join us, 2-3 PM.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bring 4,000 of your closest friends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wednesday Club! Taliesin!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes! I missed this week because I realized, once again, that I'm supposed to be doing things other than playing D&D and actually working in the real world. So I missed this Wednesday Club, but I'll be back next week. I don't actually know what the subject is yet because I've done nothing other than this all week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fantastic Four!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, probably not. We did Marvel last week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Old Man Logan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe. No Marvel this week! We've got to let DC, and Image, and independent books may give a thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: X-O Manowar!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: X-O Manowar? You are a nerd, dude, whoa! Are you coming on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How about just Manowar? The band.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, will you come on our X-O Manowar show if we do one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, man. I like football.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I love you. So yeah, there will be a Wednesday Club. Check out Twitter for updates, but I'll be back and it will be fun, and I'll be catching up on all my books.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Next up, we have debuting on, I believe it's Sunday. This Sunday, March 19th, on Alpha we have Roundtable. Which is, essentially, a series where a bunch of various storytellers get together and talk about different themes about storytelling over drinks. It's actually pretty badass. This first season is Gamemasters. We have a collection of talented people from all over the webisphere running games.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We went international!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heck yeah. This first episode premieres Sunday. It's a conversation between me, Mark Humes of High Rollers, and Adam Koebel of Roll Play. So, if you want to check it out, it's on projectalpha.com.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pro-JECT Alpha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pro-JECT Alpha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pro-JECT that Alpha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This episode is specifically about how to avoid or deal with GM burnout, which is a topic that I think a lot of people are familiar with.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't have that, do you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Huh? Not yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They make pharmaceuticals for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: None. (laughs) Hopefully. No, but honestly, it's got some good tips for anyone out there who is feeling like they're starting to run a little ragged or a little sluggish. Check it out. Hope you like it. Signal Boost episode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Featuring Satine! Which we timed out pretty well. I think intentionally.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe. Probably not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing that works out well is intentional in our sphere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Totally intentionally. So if you don't know who Satine is, get introduced to her with this week's episode of Signal Boost, and then she'll lead you graciously into GM Tips.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, no, Jason Charles is pretty gothy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's awesome. I have kind of a girl crush on Satine. She's so cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's so cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you should go watch her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, Matthew Mercer!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're welcome. Updated Trinket stats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singsong) New Trinket stats!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's got guns attached now! Gatling gun!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep, and a cannon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misfire score: 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It shoots bees!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (explosion noise) Right back into him. (bear grunting) Yes, and last but not least, Talks Machina live on Tuesdays, 7 PM, here on Twitch and Alpha. Brian Foster hosts every week. We talk about random shit about this, have guests from the community on-- check it out. It's a good time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And apparently he smells like cabbage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently, hashtag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Getting a lot of great tweets already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! That's the last of my announcements.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we doing the other thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fujio. Sam, do you have a copy of the limerick?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a copy of the limerick in my inbox, right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think you should read it off.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all cheer and laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congratulations, Tamiko. That was awesome! Well done. And everyone leveled. Everyone's at 17 except for Tary, who's at 14. Congratulations.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking dingleberry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sings) 9th-level spells!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That Scanlan could've gotten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, ladies and gentlemen. I'll remember that. Taryon apparently exploded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! There he is! Good job! (laughs) It's like you rushed here from work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Were you aware of that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He is now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I kind of remember people going through that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lashing tendrils. The ever-gaping maw, a beak swallowing you. The light fading. And there once again, you see emerging from the darkness the same expressionless, solid porcelain mask of the Raven Queen. The voice, omnipresent but gentle, strangely warming against the cold of nothing. And the voice just calls out, "I've given you back, my "champion. But you are still mine. You have a purpose. Do not forget."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both of them. All of them. But I have put my faith in you. And I await your word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, you are roused out of your slumber as well, hearing him gasp and breathe heavily, leaning off the side of the bed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. (coughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you have a nightmare?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have them, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to talk about it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eventually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Do you need anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've everything I need.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do a little bit of Druidcraft, something like lightning bugs in the room, and make them dance. Nice and calming, just trying to get back to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You get--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We get an extra hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it brings back a flood of memories of when you first had this keep made, the innocence of those days and the things you've learned since, and the new appreciations you've gained through the struggles you've had in the process. The other thing catches you is the smell of fresh breakfast being made downstairs, as Laina apparently is already on task.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll run downstairs. Can't miss that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I wake up, before we head downstairs, I grab Vax. Did you get back to sleep? Are you all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. You ready for the day?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never? Always. Yeah. No. Sure, let's go!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a born leader. Come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys come down for breakfast. Laina is currently rushing around, seemingly excited at the prospect of being back in her kitchen, which has been outfitted partially. When she returned, as you know, most everything was stolen from the keep, and it looks like she's made a few trips into town and has purchased enough to make it functional. She comes out and she starts bringing meals; she has large piles of plates. "I'm really quite sorry, but we don't have enough plates for "everyone, so if you don't mind sharing for now-- We'll go do some purchases."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start grabbing bacon from the big piles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, same. Communal style.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Well, I hope it's okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's perfect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, good. Plates. I'll have a plate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take one as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I reach in front of the boys and grab a big fistful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Half-elves are just, (gnawing noises).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Shayne Tranter, one of the guards that you originally hired and then moved over to Whitestone to guard, walk in, leather armor on, big pack over her shoulder, looks like she's also returned. As she comes in, she throws her pack down--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dwarf, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Human. Human female.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wrong note. Shayne Tranter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shayne Tranter, yeah. She walks in and throws her pack down. "Ah, good morning! Glad to "see you're all mostly alive."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you eat already?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, is there food?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Too bad, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, please, there is food.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But no plates.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But no plates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you are?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hi there! Just here for a visit. Taryon Darrington. You haven't heard of me yet, but you will. Do you work here? Are you one of our employees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm one of their employees, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, well. They made me an official member now, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great, so you'll be the one that pays me, then."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We will all chip in for whatever your monthly wages will be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unless I'm mistaken, and-- well, unless you canceled our contract. Mind you, we haven't been "guarding the keep for a long time, so I'm not going charge you for the time over that, we "appreciate you on that, but we are back on the clock, "and this is kind of my only job at the moment, so--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Start guarding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." And she smiles and sits down, and she grabs a little bit of food and pulls it off into her hand and starts eating off her leather gauntleted glove.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Taryon, you don't have to worry about paying on this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much do they cost?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A fortune.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have books, there were books, we kept books.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, there were books! There was also a dragon attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I fully expect to be treated as a full, paying member of this and I will gladly contribute one-seventh of the salary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really not necessary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's quite all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Someone should teach him the Vox Machina fight song, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should do it, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah, Grog. You have the best voice of all of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Do you know the fight song?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, I've not learned any fight song. Most of the songs that I've learned are either religious in nature or I've read them in books and I've made up my own melodies to them. They were epic poems of yesteryear, and I sort of set them to a little melody, mostly happy--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You made up songs, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's good. Each one of these songs is, like, personal, to the member, right? So you make up a song about what Vox Machina means to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll need it by sundown tomorrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, we have some work to do! Working breakfast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty sits down right next to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll work on this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm scouring my notes for where I wrote their salaries down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a long time ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was, but I've got my spiral here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're 100 gold a month for five of them, and then 50 gold a month for the other two. That's Vex's memory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my memory! 100 gold a month for each of the guards, and then what was the extra?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five of them get 100 gold a month and two of them get 50 gold a month. I don't remember why or who, but that's how-- I think the guards get 100 and the cooks get 50, or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Servants get 50, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See, as I wrote down, I believe Shayne, Cordell, Jarett, Kendrick, and Nitebe get 100 a month.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we always gave Jarett a bonus because he was captain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. And because he was hot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Well. There you go. Although Jarett is technically not on your payroll anymore. Jarett's now a member of the Pale Guard in Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I remember.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're getting better at this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know where the rest of the crew is, Shayne?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kendrick is currently watching up on the wall. Nitebe, I haven't seen since you sent him "off to Wildmount."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she gets a distant stare for a second and says, "Well, Cordell didn't make it through the ordeal."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see her kind of-- she has that look of somebody who lost a close friend. She gets a distant stare for a second, clenches her jaw, and then shakes her head and goes back to eating absentmindedly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should have some sort of service, then, or at least a dinner in Cordell's honor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's up to you. I've already had mine. My piece has been said."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we're glad to have you back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me, too."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Glad so many of us survived.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not everyone."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do any of us remember why Nitebe went to Wildmount?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sent him a long time ago to look for information about the Briarwoods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We made him a snack!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He turned into a Hot Pocket, y'all!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we fight his undead body in the crypt? Is that-- oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have not crossed his path.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, we killed our guard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You haven't heard anything from him in a long time.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Vox Machina, not returning your calls since 1992.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair, spies, by nature, live a very dangerous lifestyle that they accept. Who knows what his whereabouts are or if he'll ever show up again, but you haven't heard from him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he just took our money and ran?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's also very possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I doubt it, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would feel better about that, but probably not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try and scry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just like the notion that maybe if we just checked one more of those cells in the dungeon of Whitestone--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Want me to scry on Nitebe? I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, I'll say just because I'm curious where this particular rabbit hole leads--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not like we're going to go wherever--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're just eating breakfast. Go for it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, just scry while we're eating breakfast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. I scry on Nitebe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like that this is our breakfast entertainment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is our version of looking at our phones. This is Vox Machina going--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you see? Has he posted anything on Facebook lately?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have we figured out how to project this on a 55-inch flat wall monitor for us yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, good question!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, but the frame rate is only 120 frames per second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's only in black and white.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He posted on Instagram six weeks ago and that was it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, are you doing Scry on Nitebe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do your scrying eyes see, Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you eat your breakfast, you take a moment. You finish the small ritual on the center of the cold stone floor of your mess hall area of the keep. You focus on your fuzzy but decent enough memory of Nitebe. As the ritual completes, your vision focuses out for a second and then returns to you. There's no focus. There's no Nitebe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a Jolly Rancher in the belly of Craven Edge!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm afraid the insane things that Grog just said is correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am a powerful magician.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A happy ranch hand in the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the room to run he wants! (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is actually very terrible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is really sad in the weirdest way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, yes. This is very dark, dark time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's terrible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Travis!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I can't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're laughing at ourselves. We haven't thought of this guy in 72 years!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pre-stream! It's been since pre-stream that this has come up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zero focus. Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no creature to receive the scrying spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My breakfast is not tasting as good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which means he's either on another plane of existence... or he's fucking dead! (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is that this version of "He's in the Feywild. Everything's fine right now."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sent him to the great spy farm upstate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever timeline you believe in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least we've avenged him, in a way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we might want to send her a gift or some sort of a tribute in coin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll get right on that. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's got to be public record, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Shayne, do you have anyone you'd recommend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Honestly, me and Cordell worked as a team for a long time. We didn't really make friends. I "can go looking in the city for you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep your eyes open. We trust your judgment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unless you want to go look for yourself? I don't mind going and finding some good candidates."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Find a few more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like the city is pretty overwhelmed at the moment, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Up to you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A lot of keeps have been ruined. Guards might be looking for work, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look like you've got more important things to "focus on, so if you want to hire some guards and you have trust in me, throw me some cash and I can "probably bring some people in."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do you feel about your workload? Do you feel like you can handle this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can handle it." She shakes the bit of scrambled eggs from her gauntleted hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good leading. Good leading, Keyleth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How's your keep bandwidth right now? Is your plate full?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is shitty. Can I roll for insight and make sure that she's trustworthy? I feel like she's trustworthy, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Totally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled poorly for my insight--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll? Even if you roll poorly, with the bonuses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. She seems pretty straight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's straight with you. She's not trying to layer it at all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got a trip to take, so perhaps when we get back, we can audition some new candidates. That'll be fun. You'll enjoy that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! I would enjoy anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's quite fun. It's quite nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love me some fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you going to audition these new guards like we did you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I can figure something out. Don't worry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it. Make sure they're trustworthy, if we're not going to be around. And I hand her 500 gold for herself and for Kendrick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the three that you hire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Glad to have you back." And she turns around and leaves the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Doesn't say too much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I remember why we hired her in the first place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because she fought well! She fought a giant fucking scorpion in the courtyard. What are we doing today?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we talked about going to the Cobalt Reserve to drop off this--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To drop off the evil book and do a little research on the Nine fucking Hells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need to do a bit of shopping, but then we do have-- you're not quite done, are you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, there's that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm putting it out there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you up for it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's got to get crowned.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow! I watched that work its way from your ear all the way to your brain, there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to get crowned? Really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It got lost on the way! It was amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Even larger antlers?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's weird. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does it sit on your head, or on the antlers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They decorate it, like a winter's festival.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They put antlers on the antlers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do actually know, though you've never seen anyone wear it, because in the time that you've been learning, there hasn't been a formal Voice of the Tempest, it's not a crown. It's more of a mantle. It's a ceremonial mantle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you just hold it like a giant mantle?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Although I could, technically, transform into a fireplace now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I'm a badass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You could turn into doors!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, I could, I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Creature!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I could! Hang on, hang on!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A mimic!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A mimic! Couldn't I turn into a mimic that could be a door? Or a mantle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because I don't hate you that much yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We haven't seen a base mimic before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we have!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In this game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have seen a mimic, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't remember it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was second session.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, shizz-nap!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That was second. A mimic and a gelatinous cube in the same combat. I was like, "Hi guys! Welcome to D&D! (splat noise)"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That I remember, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was I at that one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was before you came back to the campaign.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I be a door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's a no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll look at Shapechange.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll think about it. Anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure it's just creatures.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay! What are we fucking doing? What are we doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's "different creature." If you encounter a door-shaped creature in the future, you can totally do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please! I'm sure you're having all sorts of reservations and thoughts and processes about this notion, but I will admit, I have yet to introduce your sister to the best part of being titled, which is dressing up. And it would be a coronation! We could get some clothes! We could wear something lovely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that jive with your hometown, though, Kiki? Dressing up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a sign of respect.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do all people with titles have to dress up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're very open-minded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Grand Poobah. I'm afraid you have to wear something quite formal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? Breakfast is disagreeing with me. I think I have to go back to bed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Heavy is the head that wears the crown.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gags) Yeah, I don't feel well. I've got to go. I go back up to my room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Grog storms off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really thought we were going to get him to bathe this time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he have an aversion to wearing pants?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure we can work out something without pants.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Just a belt. A really glorious belt. Over the dwarven belt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All blinged out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a kilt that's barely joined at the bottom already. It's like a poopy diaper.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just get him boots that go all the way up to the neck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It literally is a poopy diaper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Poopy diaper of dwarvenkind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Activate number one or number two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Battle kilt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously, though, what are we doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we're in town. We've got this book and a library, but we should decide what we're going to do tomorrow. What's to wait? Why don't we go home?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stammers) Well, it's just weird. It's just weird. It's been so long. It's a lot of build-up, and then it's going to be over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are adorable right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm serious!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe your dad will have information on the Nine Hells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He could, yeah. It's just, my whole life has been building up to this, and if we complete it, that makes it real.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I do have a question, actually. If you complete it, do they want you to stay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or you stay and lead your people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Does the Tempest go on road trips?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Has your life been leading up to this moment, or has your life been leading up to everything that happens after this moment?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not entirely sure of the difference of what you just said.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just saying, as somebody who spent several years of their life avoiding the one thing that would make them even remotely happy, maybe just barreling through it is the way to go. We'll be there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess it is that notion of leading up to this one moment that you've thought of for a while. Once you complete that, what happens next?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just like getting married, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it, though? Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's all the planning. That just freaks you out, that's all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you know about that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, is that theoretical or experiential?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Theoretical, obviously!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Just checking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She does read a lot. Or she used to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She still reads a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do! (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you sharing a library?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lots of things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. I don't need to hear about it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you don't. That's why I was so excited that you pried.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's whatever you guys think is best. We can go to Westruun first, or we can go to Zephra first. Just whatever you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a big decision for you to make, I think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's the difference of a day or two, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the heavy footfalls upstairs of Grog's feet and a door slamming shut.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He took his time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we need an extra day to convince Grog to wear pants? That could be the deciding factor! Maybe we should put it on him. Right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make a decision.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Leader. You're going to be a leader. Just make a choice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody else believes in you. Why shouldn't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pencil or pen?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking forward to buying a dress either way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's check in at Westruun. Drop off the book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And see how you feel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll head from Westruun to Zephra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to be very good at this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man! Decision-making is hard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So many choices.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So wait. (valley girl voice) Would the shops here be better to buy a dress than the shops in Westruun?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good question! Who's importing more? Where's fashion week happening?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're both handicapped, aren't they?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They've both been under some recent duress, so it really could go either way. Emon is definitely more of the cultural hub, especially since it's such a huge port town. You get a lot more cultural influence from other continents and heavier trade. Emon would probably have better outfits. But Westruun-- which, Grog, you grew up in, and you guys have spent some time in-- does have its own textiles district. There are weddings that happen there. They have other events where they sell fine--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's Westruun like? Pittsburgh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could say, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like Wisconsin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, that's less disappointing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Emon's the New York. Westruun's the Pittsburgh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whitestone's the Boulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah! (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's Boulder, Colorado.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I like it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boulder, baby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's beautiful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it's the Pittsburgh, then we should go now, because everything closes at five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you want to go all-out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In theory, they'll have your crest on file. That's one of those things, any dressmaker would actually know how to assemble something appropriate for any house of any nobility that exists.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? Vasselheim will actually know a little bit about Orcus and I bet the Nine Hells, as well, being the god hub.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh, a work vacation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did mention if we wanted to drop off the book at Westruun or Vasselheim--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go to Vasselheim!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to do that instead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Decision's fucking made. Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right! Let's go to Vasselheim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never been. That sounds great!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far north have you been, Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Quite far north. Right? I'm from the north?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're from Wildmount, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're from Wildmount, which is-- as far as you know, from where you grew up, Tal'Dorei is to the southwest of where you grew up. Issylra, which is where Vasselheim is, and Othanzia is far to the east.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First there was the dinosaurs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I lived in the north of that place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You lived in the north of Wildmount. It's pretty Siberian, you would consider it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to go to there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thrive in cold places. Is this such a place?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is quite chilly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not as cold as my home, but it'll do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have some excellent cold-weather robes in my bag of holding that I would love to flaunt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also probably need a few healing potions and such, and we'll probably have better luck somewhere else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything else we need to do before we leave Emon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They'll have potions and things there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We probably need to stock up a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. They'll have these things at Vasselheim?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't just have some health potions in your armor? You can't just plink one out of your nutsack or something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to reach onto my robe and pull out a patch that produces four healing potions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they regular, or are they greater?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're regular.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man! We should tear you apart limb from limb and see what fucking shakes out!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please don't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does that regenerate and come back? Is it one time only?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but I'll just buy another one if I run out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Another robe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like a four-pack of medieval Five-Hour Energy drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's literally Monster Energy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's like a 1st-level healing potion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tary, Vasselheim does get a little bit--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They don't like magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They don't like magic?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arcane magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Arcane magic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I practice alchemic magic, mostly, so I'll be okay. I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You might want to keep a low profile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you have a giant arcane metal man following you around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Maybe I should disguise Doty in some way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can throw a cloth over him or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make him look like he's just a big dude wearing a robe with a hood over his head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or a ghost.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or a ghost! Is it Halloween?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is sadly not Hallow's Eve. We can put him in some armor or some fake cloth of some sort.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's just put a robe over him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you and I craft something for him before the journey, like a face mask of some sort that makes him look like a brave warrior?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I am really good at disguises. I haven't flexed those muscles in a while, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let him give it a go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can make disguises?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can work with a little bit of nose putty, and yeah, I can make a fake face for this guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That I would love to see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As best as you understand, it isn't like, "Oh my god, there's some sort of magic source in "Vasselhiem, arrest everyone involved." It's not super illegal, it's just generally frowned upon and calls suspicion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I want to pursue you making a mask for Doty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So do I. I feel really rusty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to help him because I'm a rogue, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get all the mice involved.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do we want this guy to look like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should we turn him into a goliath, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, are we going to do full body paint for this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we just put a stealth cloak over him or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealth cloak? Do you have a stealth cloak?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, then paint his-- yeah, I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's make him look like a goliath that wears a lot of robes because he was horribly scarred.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start taking robes out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, how do you feel about this? I feel like you have the look--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog's upstairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, you're upstairs, you're not actually here. Never mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's upset about the notion of pants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Making him look like he is in a suit of armor seems like a thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could put him in a suit of armor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's already metal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fine. I take all of the robes off. Do whatever you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is Doty strong enough to wear a suit of armor?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, decorative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, decorative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Doty is his own suit of armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are we doing this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because this is funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it's amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a giant automaton!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just wear a robe!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having a wonderful time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want Doty with a fake nose. That's all I want.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, do that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to need your help because I'm not used to working on robots. You can make some mesh work, right? And we can get some clay, and some spectacles like yours, but maybe shaded. Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's only got the one pair now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can make him a mask at the very least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have made masks for myself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is going to look ridiculous!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone's going to be like, that's a robot wearing a mask!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's just a man with no arms, legs, heads, limbs and chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't have to, I mean--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're doing it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's spend some time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone else can get their little run-around of Westruun done while we sit making a robot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, Vax, needing materials to prepare such an elaborate--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, give me some money. I don't have any money. I never have money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You need money to go buy a stupid mask for a stupid robot?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the first time in this entire goddamn campaign--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it isn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give me some fucking money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or, I can give you money.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want her money.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is important for him to express himself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have passed out money lately, before, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I throw myself off of things for this one, she can't give me 50 gold pieces.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fine!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about everybody gets a thousand gold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a party!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, everybody take a thousand gold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have this ability? I feel like I remember it, but I'm looking through--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't know?! (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure you do! I think you have a disguise kit. It's not an ability per se.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have Imposter, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, you have Imposter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's me, can I use it on a robot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, Liam, if you don't have this ability, I want to see this even more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, we're doing it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just bluff your way through it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because Imposter is the ability to mimic somebody else. It has nothing to do-- A disguise kit is what you're using.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I've always had a disguise kit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I did something back in the home game, I did something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you've done a couple of things. But it's not an ability you have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you do have an ability, but it's only for you, it's not for Doty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You own a cardboard box with a bunch of stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a large endeavor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is five times that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So I'm going to need you to roll an investigation check. This is your ability to go around the town and find, through the midst of chaos of Emon trying to repair itself, somebody who can sell you the supplies necessary.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that is a 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need some clay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A natural 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, not a natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But a 20? That's still fine. All right, it takes you--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I gave him a list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is expensive for anyone who's just-- and a lot of it is burlap material that's gone over with a weatherproofing liquid, that when it solidifies, it gives almost a rubbery texture. It's used for carts that are traveling a long distance under bad weather. And you figure that might resemble some sort of a skin-type texture at a distance. You gather other elements to build a mask, to wrap things in material, to block things that might look metallic. So yeah, so you gather things that might work in your favor. So as you collect this, what are you guys working on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're making a mask?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, the first thing that we're going to need, is we're going to need a way of connecting this to him without limiting his movement, so I'm making so it's a very accessible, easy harness to get this on and off. And starting to design and put together how we're going to-- what I'd like to make is a couple-- a porcelain cover for the hands and face so that it actually looks like perhaps-- it won't draw immediate suspicion, but if it does, it will look like somebody with an artificial limb, maybe they've been hurt.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get me ten sets of scissors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) So are you crafting the porcelain?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am. I've got the kiln.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, but your materials, you're used to using--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Instead of porcelain, I'm going for the ceramics that I use for some of my build. It's more practical. I've been working on some jewelry shit, I could genuinely learn how to do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is true, but the skillset for jewelry is very different from the skillset of porcelain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need you to make a rig, like in a video game. Can you do that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going go into town and buy some plates for Laina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I will say--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm willing to have this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could just use mud from outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have a set of potter's tools? Because that would be specifically what would be used for this, if you're going to be working with ceramics and porcelain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I roll to see? Because I have a kiln, so I might have it, but I don't know if I have it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you have a kiln that's designed more for-- it's more of a metal-use forge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's more of a metal-use forge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it'll destroy ceramics. It burns at a certain heat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This could be the dumbest--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the best thing we've ever wasted time on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If prototype one fails, I'll make it out of pewter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This is an adjacent skill set. You're not going to get your proficiency bonus to it, but you do have materials to essentially try it. I want you to go ahead and roll a base dexterity check. Just add your dexterity modifier. You're not proficient.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trusting in Gil, because he also can't make a pot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Say the thing, say the incantation!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mecca lecca high, mecca hiney ho, don't fuck me, Gil.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are those pottery tools, Gil?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And those pottery tools are--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) It's a good roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. It takes you the better part of the next two hours, but you manage to create some--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for helping me Ghost, by the way. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have to cool and harden, but in the process of crafting it and heating it, you do have some decent ceramic plates that you think might work. They're going to be fragile.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not like they'll crumble on their own walking, but, if they take any sort of chip and damage the ceramic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hands and face is what I was hoping for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say the better part of two hours or so to craft them, and then you begin to heat them in the kiln. It'll take you a while for them to harden and set.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm peeking at him, seeing how he works--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check. Proficiency plus dex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to-- oh, sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can assist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, this would be proficiency plus intellect, is what it would be, because this is trying to figure it out specifically.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd be happy for an assist, unless you're doing something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was going upstairs to ask one of the help something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, go ahead, okay, that's fine. I'll just work on your robot by myself, then. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was the servant's name who you said used to have short hair, now long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shayne.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go to her? Him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a her. She will punch you so hard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I offer to buy her hair for 100 gold pieces to use as a wig.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's literally outside, sitting on the outside wall of the gate, leaning forward, just on a stool, with a loaded crossbow over her lap, looking out at the distance. And you're down below, about 20 feet down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You there, excuse me. Hello?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks over the top. "Yeah?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi! Taryon Darrington. New member of the group. Hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god, where's Shorthalt when you need him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he roll well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not saying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Persuasion? 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "You're kidding me, right?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It might even save a life.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(laughs) Make it 500 and you got a deal."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And a bargain at that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, it was getting too long, anyway." She makes her way down the ladder and just walks past you into the keep. Comes back about half an hour later, head completely shaved smooth, and she's got, in a little square of fabric, a cluster of all of her red hair. She balls it up, comes over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A pleasure doing business with you. This haircut might very well be the fate of the world, so thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're welcome."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here's your money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. Here's your fucking hair. God damn weirdo." And walks off and heads back to her perch at the top of the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Buy my book! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You now have Shayne's hair--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to try and make a wig out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't really know how.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just a bunch of pieces of hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Glue? I've got alchemy, right? I can make, like, goop?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind. Don't want to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Do you want to do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make some goop. Some glue to put on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, using the basis of a tanglefoot bag, which is a very simple alchemical--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it's got goo in it, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I can make a gallon of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to apply it to the top of Doty's head, and begin to very carefully layer hair across it. I'm going to need-- let's see-- (laughs) I love you guys so much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long does goop last? Will Doty just always have hair now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it's pretty sticky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make-- just make a dexterity check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It could've gone a lot worse. From a distance, this kind of looks like a person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I also gave him a little bit of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little bit of goatee?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to match me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, great. You now have--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you mean the fu man, or did you give him the full goatee? Because you just did the fu manchu.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Probably just the fu man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, there you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's going to be covered by a mask.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've crafted your own avatar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the hair curly or straight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little wavy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wavy, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her hair had been short before, when it grew out long, it came out a little wavy. So yeah, it has a little bit of a-- it looks like... What was the actor's name? From Mask?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Eric Stoltz?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of looks like that on Doty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eric Stoltz. Google it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cher was great in that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a great movie.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you were going to go Ronald McDonald, so that's a step up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, see? But that's kind of the texture and the look of the hair, from what I recall it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, we've set the stage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax, bring us home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, good gods! What did you make, what did you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not just the president, he's a member, too! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's fantastic, is he's glued the facial hair before the porcelain mask was put on, so as Percy and Vax come in with their pieces--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, I've got the-- Oh, good God!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, it's bad. It's really bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's-- I mean, like, it's--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a start. I think the hair will actually help the molding clay stay in place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to put a little wrap, it'll be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you've got hands?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes, that too. Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, excellent. Excellent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frankenstein.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's make this happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, you put on the harness. You get the ceramic plates on that can loosely appear to be smoother, and a little more of a general curvature to the joints, so that it looks more natural from a distance. You put on the-- The mask of porcelain that you made, I mean, you know, the facial hair that's underneath and is on Doty's face is going to be under the mask.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Thank God.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could attempt to remove it, if you'd like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I think that'll help--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. We'll leave it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- it'll help hold all it in place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a little glue to help stick it there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In case we're in combat and it comes out, maybe we'll get, like, a momentary element of surprise as they go, 'My God, what is that?'

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That only you know about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had extra hair, I wanted to use it.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is this episode? What--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my God.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the worst thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Play 'em home, keyboard cat. Roll a disguise kit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, all right. I'm going to try to make this a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (keyboard sounds)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What number do I use for the disguise kit? Dexterity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this would be-- hold on, the toolkit here-- with you it would be-- Yeah, because it is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I'm a rogue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's how nimble your fingers are. It's a dexterity bonus plus the proficiency modifier for a disguise kit. If you are proficient with this kit, with the disguise kit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, my gods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are your proficiencies?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think so. I mean, I don't know, so I'm just going to say no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then it's just dexterity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dexterity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll a d20, add your dex bonus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right, I'm going to go for like, a General Krieg-type look to the face? I'm going to do my best--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- to redheaded General Krieg?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, here we go. I'm going to use Luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Are you sure?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm quite sure. Natural 20!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (all cheer)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: General Krieg, it's good to see ya!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In spite of the absurdity of what you've managed to accomplish with the better part of your day, as the sun is now setting, and the rest of you have been wondering what the fuck is going on down there, you manage to build some semblance of a muscular structure underneath the robes. And amongst the porcelain mask that Percy had set as a base, you have crafted texture, color, it looks kind of like a face.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks like Lincoln from Disneyland! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which means--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, it really does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, not a good Disney animatronic. Like, state fair animatronic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Chuck E. Cheese.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. This has been through a few fires.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was just going to say, been through a fire!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (animatronic sounds)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's Bonnie Springs. It's straight-up Bonnie Springs. But, given the circumstances, not too bad!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boys, I'm so proud of both of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, art is subjective, all right? Put clothes on top of this thing and we're golden, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Happy St. Patrick's Day, everybody!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm quite pleased. I'm quite pleased.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't think that Doty could be improved, but you all impressed me today. Thank you. Thank you for this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good work, everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good work, everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good teamwork.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Teamwork!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! Feels good to say it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, good work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shall we go to Vasselheim?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'll come down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What have you been doing up there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that General Krieg? (screams) (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's all right! It's all right!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very expensive, don't break it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why have you aligned yourself with this creature?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I knock on the side of its head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (hollow metal knocking sounds)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not Krieg.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Dootie.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He did not have a face or hands--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you say 'fire crotch'?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, he did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: --or a cloak. He didn't have any of that stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but Grog, we glued it on. We Dorked with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, he's wearing a disguise! Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, he's a disguised robot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who did that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, all of us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As a team?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mainly these three--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mostly Keyleth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It occurs to you guys, you don't know where the hair came from.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Druidcraft.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, well done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got all your hair--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you do that to me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where did you get the hair?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where is the hair from?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got some tricks up my sleeve. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you pull it like a patch off and it turns into a bunch of hair?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. Maybe I did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God, magic is amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you get glue all over my robe that I put on him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. Maybe I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, motherfucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That'll do all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singsong) That robe is ruined.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! It's not ruined!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Certainly. Elements of it are permanently glued to Doty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I think this is your hair-dying robe now. Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was my stealth robe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And now your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And will be once more, I'll have it cleaned and pressed for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait there's glue on the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the stealth robe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- on the elven cloak? Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that mean that the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a magical item you put on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs nervously) Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You put a magical item on the robot?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the only robe I fucking had!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shouts) I didn't know you were going to glue it to him!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Much sentimental value--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (shouts) I know!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now there's a robot with sentimental value.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoop-dee-doo. Let's just do the thing, come on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're right, now that I've blurred my vision, the glue is the most noticeable part.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Makes it look like he's seen some shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Motherfucker! Let's go to Vasselheim.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll buy you a new robe.

lines.name: MATT
