lines.text: Doty's been standing there, and as soon as you guys say let's go and Doty starts moving, it has this scary Return to Oz feel to it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew. I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is everything I've ever wanted.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (Doty walking sounds)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, where did you learn contouring?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Because that's really well done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've seen what I can do with hair, right? I mean, are you really surprised?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good point, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the elvish half.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the elvish half.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the elvish half.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Clasp time, Clasp time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. All right, so. You go ahead and head up to the Temple of Sarenrae within your keep, there is the central tree there. You go ahead and Transport via Plants to--

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: Vasselheim!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where in Vasselheim do you want to exit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we have the book? We have the book in the chest? Chest and the book?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have the book.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not the chest, but in the bag of holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we have the book. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wrapped in cloth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where? Wasn't there the tree that was near the Slayer's Take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one, yeah, there's one that patches there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. We'll do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use that one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's use that save point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. What do they call it? Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Waypoint.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There! Yes, thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The waypoint.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you looking for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we should go--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Library.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, the library.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Library.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We delivered the horn of Orcus to the Platinum Dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the Platinum Sanctuary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. So we should probably go talk to them as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I imagine they'd have a good hiding place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's where I'd put the Ark of the Covenant, certainly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And also to talk to them about Orcus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Since that's--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then shops for more potions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want to split up? You want to go talk Orcus?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's actually not a bad plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. You're going to go research Orcus?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The twins?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Percy, you want to go to the Platinum Reserve?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. We'll take the book. Tary? You want to come with us or the twins?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With you, absolutely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go with the twins, they're more inclined to violence.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Grog could also go learn about the Nine Hells!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no no. Okay, wait. Books?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Books.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I'm doing my own thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're gonna go learn about scary things, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've been wanting to buy some potions and things, is that an option here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, do you want to be team potions?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And buying things? You like buying things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Team Shopping, right Grog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary-- Tary!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog's really good at buying potions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary-- I pull Tary aside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you're going to go shopping with Grog you need to know-- don't look at him. He is terrible with money.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can't look away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tary, he's terrible with money. I mean like, he will offer them-- stop it! He will offer them double what they ask for.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. And that's not good? Don't worry, I've been raised around money, I know its worth. I have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just saying--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- at least six trust funds and they're all managed quite well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (deadpan) I'm so happy for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tru-- what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just keep an eye on him, all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will receive your trust.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will fulfill your request as a fellow member of this team.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (strained) Fabulous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for entrusting me with this mission.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, Tary, good luck. Grog, keep an eye on him, make sure that everything's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I will.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As they leave, I spank Grog hard on the ass and say, money was meant to be spent!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like that twin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right, you scatter into three different directions. First--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To the library?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you were going to the Platinum Sanctuary.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Jesus. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to the library.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which is to the place where they--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Archive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shouts) To the archive!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you guys both say goodbye and then you're walking the same direction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep! Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you're parked over here, too? Oh, okay, cool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm tired-- okay, this is awkward now, we'll just keep--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're right next door, they're connected, they're partners.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well some people go this way, and some people go that way and some people go both ways!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The color of the sky's starting to turn a bit different. You guys make your way to the outside doors of the Sanctuary, where you see the guards are there, stationed, and as you approach, some of them put up a bit of an aggressive front from a defensive standpoint, but one of them does recognise you and approaches, pulls the front of his helmet up. "You are Vox Machina."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What business do you have here at the Platinum Sanctuary?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have come to discuss the (whispers) Horn of Orcus that we delivered here a while ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you request an audience with Scalebearer Vord?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The sphinx's name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The sphinx's name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All righty. Highbearer Vord. He says, "Very well. Please to be patient, I believe "he is busy."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he heads inside, the doors close behind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As he does that, I look to Vax and go, hey, I have an idea. So the book we have, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if instead of leaving it here, we left it at the Raven Queen's sanctuary? Don't you think they would keep it more safe? Because she hates undead, right? This is like her nemesis, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She does. Yeah, I mean, that's a whole thing, I don't think that's a bad idea, but I feel like if I go there, I need to stay for a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, not yet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, cool. Let's forget I mentioned anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. About 15 minutes or so pass as you guys are led up. It's a gorgeous view from up here, by the way, I mean, for Vasselheim, the cloud cover is probably 70 to 80% of the year, with coming storms and sleet. This is one of the few days you've been during this part of the season where the sky is open. You actually see some blue in the sky, and as the light of the day begins to grow more towards a dusk color you start seeing the distant change and it's just endless thick, dense forest of the Vesper Timberland all around the city. And so there's kind of this serene waiting period as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just lean against Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Follow me." Turns around. Leads you in. He's carrying his large, very well-polished tower shield to his side, he still has his helmet visor up. Leads you into the central structure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we know what we're going to say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to talk about the book. We're going to ask them if they can destroy it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or hold it, right? Do something with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Preferably destroy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. It's history, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's dangerous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: True.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So yes, you've summoned me, "what is your business?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't mean to summon you, Scalebearer, I know your time is precious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: NecromANcy? NecrOmancy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: NecrOmancy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: NecrOmancy. Josh NecrOmancy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: NECromancy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Necrome-- yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Necromé?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Necromé.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs) Does that name mean anything to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have read of it, yes. I mean, it's a creature of lore. Opash was before the Divergence, "even. If you indeed found a tome that once belonged to him, this is of much interest to us "and our network of researchers."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Research?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Researchers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an evil tome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can only assume it is, you are right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We came to Vasselheim to dispose of it. My sister has read it. Parts of it, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) All of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's foul. It should not be allowed to exist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can ensure that it falls into no hands beyond this temple. However, we do have to "research the contents, you understand. The necessity of understanding the evils and darkness "that are out there, that when they arise we can properly counter them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Turd burgers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not terrible, but it ain't good, 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. He's hard to read in general, disposition and station, and his eyes are so white, like the iris is almost not visible. And he's stone-faced in his explanation but he's making sense, you know. If you have information on--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Necromancy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On necromancy!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Jif.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or any devices that darker forces utilize, it better prepares you if you know what those entail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And if there is any place that could withstand the corruption of such a book, it would be the strongest focus of the Platinum Dragon's divine power that exists on the planet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you get the sense that Vord is not deceiving you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happens after you research it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We seal it in the vaults below, same place we stored the horn."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Has that vault ever been disturbed in its entire history?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's been a long time and we've reinforced it. If I recall, last time you were here you "encountered some of our defense yourselves."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think you'll know by memory that we are well fortified. So--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be warned, the book tried to claim me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm. If you resisted it, I have no doubt our clerics can as well." He nods his head over to one of his advisors.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shade.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dark shade.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This young man with a very, very tight braid pulled to the back of the head that dangles about mid-back behind silver and white robes just approaches and puts his hands out to accept the tome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry, we weren't clear. We came to discuss it. We don't have it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well. Return with the tome, should you see fit to "leave it here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask you, how much do you know of Orcus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know enough."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know much of anything, and it's important that we learn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm." So, he nods to one of the other advisors who steps off for a moment. "Sit a "moment. This is a conversation to have." And some of the guards come and bring a few chairs and set them behind you. "Orcus, the demon prince of undeath, resides in the depths of Thanatos, one of "the varying realms of the Abyss. It is here that he snuffs the life from all creatures and brings "them under his sway. He is an entity of ever-hungering need for power, and to take all "life and break it so he can bring it under his control. Thankfully, as one of the betrayer gods, "he was sealed away, and the Divine Gate was placed up to prevent his, and any other evil entities' "entrance into our world. However, that does not prevent him from sending his minions, sending his "powers, sending his influence out through the permeable, small gaps in this gate. So his "influence remains."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He only has two horns, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! Four, once."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two that he maintains on himself to this day, and two that were severed, enchanted, and "bequeathed into two of his, at the time, one of his champions."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And all these many months, you've been in possession of the horn you have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you don't have another one down in that vault?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We do not."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What have you learned of the one you do have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, this belonged to a great and terrible champion of Orcus. It was utilized in the "Calamity, the war that came to the very gates of Vasselheim. This armored evil was destroyed and "torn asunder, the horn scattered. We currently have some of our finest and brightest out in "search of the other one, now that we know they have and can be recovered. Not to any avail yet, "but we're doing our best."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you hear any word of that horn, will you send word to us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. And you do the same, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One was dangerous enough."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to discuss a few things, but we'll fetch the tome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much for your time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't have much of it. If you have business to discuss with me personally, I would "recommend doing it now. Otherwise, you'll be dealing with one of my advisors when you return."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know much about the Nine Hells?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a complicated subject. What do you need to know?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fear we have to travel there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why, pray tell, do you intend to travel there?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There is a rakshasa after my brother and our cleric friend, Pike. And, unfortunately, I fear he will return if we don't snuff him out at the source.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's already made one attempt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hmm."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's only a matter of time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whereas few mortals dare tread in the Abyss, there "have been some from many different realms, who go to the Hells to do business."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you know what sort of people might survive there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or fit in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ones that don't make a scene. Just know; they're "very clever, and above all else, they seek your soul."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you for your time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, we'll go to the Cobalt Reserve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. One of my advisors will receive the tome upon its delivery."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fabulous. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good luck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whistles)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stands up and as soon as you begin to stand up, the seats are already immediately pulled out from behind you. The guards separate them, he leaves with his advisors and you guys are led out of the temple back onto the winding staircase and into the heart of Vasselheim.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull Vex into an alleyway. (sighs) I don't know what the right thing to do is. I thought one thing going in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And now I think maybe you were right. I have not wanted to go to that temple, though. She has finally been speaking to me again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. What about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When I died, I saw her. I have dreamed of her already. And she speaks of some sort of purpose on the horizon. And I don't know if she's talking about your promise you made, or what. But she is with us. And I barely know what the fuck I'm doing, but I know that she doesn't want that book to exist. And, honestly, I am frightened of going to that temple because I want time. I want time with you, I want time with Keyleth, I want time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I don't want to lose that time now, I want to be selfish for a little while. We've been working so fucking hard, by all rights we should be dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think if you go to the Raven Queen's temple, she'll claim you for her own right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I don't know. I don't know. And look at this. And I start to unbuckle the front of my chest-- Relax, look at this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What am I seeing? (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see right around his heart there's a dark spot in the skin where some dark veins travel for about an inch or two across.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck is this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When did it happen?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you mean, you don't know? Did it happen after you died?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think so. Hurts a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck? We have to get you to a cleric, that's not normal!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not really, no. I cover it back up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure it's related to her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I think you are right, and I think that they're going to hold that, and someone will take it, whether it's in a hundred years or a thousand years, and she doesn't want it and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Playing devil's advocate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, they already have that. They don't have this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then let's go to the Raven Queen's temple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to go now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, while you guys make your way to the Raven's Eyrie, we go to you two. You guys are currently looking for a library. Who wants to make the investigation check to ask for information?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll do it, that's funny.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I have known anything about what that thing was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not really. It doesn't look diseased. It looks bruised almost. It's just a strange-looking bruise where you can see some of the veins are dark and visible, almost like varicose near the surface.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like trauma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah, but it doesn't look--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't look like Raishan's?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's not like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, we have the book. They went to the sanctuary. We are going to the library.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as I know, that's what you guys are searching for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I thought we had the book.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's in the-- wait, no, the book's in the bag.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'm the one with the low intelligence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (singsong) Grog has the book.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys, I thought our whole thing was that we were taking the book to the sanctuary and then you guys were like, we're going to the sanctuary, because you guys totally gave me shit when I was like, the library, and you were like, not the library, but apparently we are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Let's go to the library.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't agree with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's crazy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not fair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I'm the new guy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16, investigation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We said we had the book.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We thought we did, we were not paying attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you say you took the book?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we took the book, that was our whole fucking plan--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought we took the book too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- that we took the damn book.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It occurs to me it was actually in the bag that Grog was holding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I would assume if we said, "we're taking the book", that would mean--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you guys said you're taking the book; Grog, you heard them take the book?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought you said you were taking the book to go look at the wherever.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have the book.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I'll take that as consensus to say that you guys have the book.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just, it's all paper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's glued under the cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Papier-mâché of evil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys, not having a bag of holding, are clutching the tome-- it's a big tome, it's like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought we put it in a box, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we didn't have a box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was no box. It was a book wrapped in cloth in the bag of holding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In a box.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We wrapped it in cloth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there you go. You have a tome wrapped in cloth under your arm. You guys spend about an hour or so asking around. The locals, they're-- not saying they're not friendly, but not all of them are well-versed in what you're asking. You say library, some of them are more simpler folk are like, "I don't--" and eventually somebody says, "Oh yeah, you can head over to the-- what's it "called? The Cobalt Vault. It's in the southern region of the Quad Roads."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's exactly what I was looking for, thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, yeah, I'll show you." And the guy gives you a couple directions down the road, and you make your way there, and it's similar to the Cobalt Reserve in Westruun, but it's about a quarter of the size.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks somewhat transparent, like it's made of a glass-type material. As you step into the front, you can see a central chamber within the inside that's also cylindrical, so you have a small walk-around hallway on the immediate inside of this giant structure, and then the actual library is in the interior, and so on the outside, you see a few books and there are some paintings and tapestries on the walls and you see a few varying monks walking around, a handful that are curious and turn as you walk in. They're all wearing the uniform, dark grey and blue robes of the Cobalt Soul, and there is a desk at the front, where you have a young woman of olive skin sitting, her hair short and wavy with very thick spectacles adorning the front of her nose. Young-ish, maybe mid-twenties. She looks up as soon as you guys approach. "Good day. I fear we're still in the "process of preparing the interior, but what do you require?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were hoping for access to some of the deep research archives. We've been looking around, we have several complicated matters that we need to research, and we heard that you had a wonderful collection and we were hoping to gain access to some materials, preferably of the histories of Orcus, the Nine Hells, a few various things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm terribly sorry, that type of research is only for Cobalt Soul members."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who could we talk to about special access? I'm sure that there must be somebody in charge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I apologize, I am--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to have--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I am Keyleth of the Air Ashari and this is Percival Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Close enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're a part of the group Vox Machina, we've been through here before, we're part of the Slayer's Take. This is a matter of great importance, so if there is any type of upper management we could talk to-- (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck this. It's just that dismount at the end.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (creepy voice) Who wants to talk to the librarian?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Keyleth's specialty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was going great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (coughs) Mm, 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean no offense, but I don't think we have the kind of research that you're looking for "that we could--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We would also possibly like to make a donation. And I pull out the Manual of Quickness of Action, place it upon the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She adjusts her glasses for a second and reaches into the desk and pulls out a small, white gem and passes it over, and as she does, you can see the front of the tome seems to glow almost like a blacklight over something that was reactive to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Covered in semen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as I said it, I was waiting for Sam on that one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for ruining that one for me for all time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scans over. "Perhaps. Give me just a moment, please." And she slides the book in your direction, gets up and exits through one of the small doors in the side, that you didn't notice until now. It's part of a similar stone, just gives way and then closes behind her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we'll see what happens now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And yet, worst case scenario, I also have this book that Scanlan read that's on how to be a good leader--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hold on to that one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I'll hold on to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have come to offer this book as trade?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you are seeking what?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we are in a bit of a bind. We are members of a traveling group of adventurers known as Vox Machina. We recently helped defeat the Chroma Conclave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm familiar with your exploits as of late, yes. It is our job to collect information and "history and record of it, so I am very aware."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, the deeds and those things that must be done have not yet been fulfilled. We have just a few last, treacherous events that we must complete before the Chroma Conclave is completely put to rest. One of which has to do with Orcus, and the other with the Nine Hells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a rakshasa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we are desperate for knowledge that may keep us safe in our travels. Prepare us for our enemies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come with me." And he takes the book and sweeps it up, and it vanishes into his robe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Worth it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leads you into the small doorway that you watched open and shut before, and on the inside, you go from this barren outer walkway, into this large cylindrical library that is from floor to ceiling about 60 feet tall, with dozens of ladders that move around, and you can see books are in the process of being put up, some books are being categorized, it looks like there were stacks that have just arrived that are in the process of being researched and copied, there are a number of these monks that are at different tables in the process of making copies of books, this is specifically a repository for the gathering and guarding of information. In the center of the chamber, there is a spiral staircase that leads to an upper platform that has another series of chairs, either a research or reading section, and there are only a handful of people on the interior that are not dressed in the same way that these monks are, but each one of them is attended by a monk. And you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anyone look familiar? Any uniforms that look recognizable?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, use that one. That's weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's on another dice? All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There, that's better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that's good!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is that? Oh--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's a 19! Perception?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 21. Sorry, 20. Yeah, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you glance around--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go! I was like, your wisdom's pretty high--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You look around really fast, glance at each person that is not of the Cobalt Reserve's attire, no one you recognize. But they all appear to be fairly affluent. And they're all in the process of reading through some sort of thick book with a stack next to them, of varying sizes, and the monk is just standing there patiently, watching them as they do so.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's disconcerting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you recall, from your first time at the Cobalt Reserve, that no books can be taken from the Reserve. They can be read within the interior, they can be copied, notes can be taken. But you cannot remove them, and the monk that is assigned to you is both a guide, and to make sure you don't take anything you're not supposed to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. Theft protection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. And it seems that Kusuo has taken upon himself to be your assigned monk.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's quite a bustle today, this is impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But we are happy to know that people are "interested in knowledge. Any given day."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Any reason for the sudden spark in interest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, recent events of dragons terrorizing countrysides, leads people to want to defend "themselves and learn of these occasional terrors."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, follow me." And he leads you to the back of the spiral staircase, as it comes and meets with the floor, there is a large rug that sits as part of the decor there, and he glances around, and using his foot, his toe clips the edge of it and flicks up and catches the rug, folds it and sets it down, in one swift motion you weren't expecting, and with the dust that sets off, you now see what looks to be a trap door of the same material as the hardwood floor of the library. The small chain that he then bends down carefully, tugs and lifts, and you see the staircase that descends below.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you do that with your toes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not with my toes, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's some Name of the Rose shit right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! I'm committed!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You're just going down--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then an escalator!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the private collection.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Books that want to get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As each lock is taken, he opens the case and on the inside you smell this scent of dust and ash, and there are four books in there, two of which look damaged, but they all look very old, and he reaches in and grabs two of them. One of them is one of the damaged ones, one of them is not. "You seek information on Orcus?" Sets one tome down on one of the nearby closed cases. "And the Nine Hells." Places the other next to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just try and see if I can discern what the other two books are just from looking in and being a nerd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't have any labelling on the cover.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I suppose we'll sit, and get to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I sit down and I open the book.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Which one are you opening?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before I touch it, this doesn't react poorly to people handling it, does it? There's no--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He arcs an eyebrow towards you. "No, part of our distinct training is to disable any sort of "wards should you wish to research."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which one are you opening, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I open the first one just to look into--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Orcus one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you speak Abyssal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do not speak Abyssal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Orcus tome you aren't able to read. It is all in Abyssal.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you speak Abyssal? And the other book--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other book?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- I open up the Nine Hells, take a look.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one is actually written in Common.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Weird question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Abyssal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know creatures who are from the Abyss, right? I've encountered them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have encountered demons in your past, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I do a Shapechange into a demon, can I then read Abyssal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lemme look at the spell real fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to change into a pit fiend in the library?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would let him know! I would give him like a disclaimer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to show you a really weird birthmark, don't panic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, if he really was a demon, why would he need to do research?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who is my father?! I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Genealogy of the Nine Hells!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not specify, but it says you gain the abilities.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I've read it says you keep the same intellect, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you keep the same intellect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You keep the same mental stats.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you get the abilities--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you retain all your skills and saving throw and proficiencies, in addition to gaining those of the creature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In addition.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might as well try!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a moment also before this happens, open the Common book, take a moment, and gently ask the good sir if they have a reading glass around, because I still don't have any reading glasses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He gives a curious look. "But of course." And he snaps his fingers, and the other monks, he just darts off for a second and then returns a moment later with a small wooden case that opens up, and on the inside there are four different types and thickness of reading glass you can go through. You find one that'll work okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perfect. I'm going to let you deal with this other end of things, because I'm going to sit and read.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that demon guy we encountered? Does he have a name?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Phil.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean the pit fiend, or--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you mean like Senokir?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, he was a genasii.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The pit fiend was a devil. Who was the guy who lied to us, and you said devil at one point, and he was actually a demon.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm looking right now for the scroll that's here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have to read the scroll, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could read it to you. If that's what you're asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks you over. "The scroll I would put at a fair 6,000 gold pieces."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gulps) Watch how it's done. I'm going to put an amount of gold on the table. I'd like you to consider it, and if it's to your liking, take it, and if not, just shake your head. And I'll put 200 gold on the table. I'll put 200 more. I'll put 2,000 more. And another 2,000.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17. Plus seven! 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes the gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check and mate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Check'n'mate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now have a scroll of fire shield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scroll of fire shield, excellent. I don't know what that is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow. Do you have anything that makes you faster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I said I have something that makes you jump."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I'm pretty good at jumping. What about regular healing potions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That I've got! You cleared me out of my other various vials last time."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No new exotics came in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I'm waiting on-- Trade's been a little slow. Looks like things are getting up in Emon, so "hopefully we'll have more soon. But for the time being, I do have some more healing potions." And he goes into the back room, and you hear him rummaging for a minute. You hear one crate fall over and a couple of things shatter. "Ah god damn--". And eventually he comes back through the door, and he's holding in his arms a few clusters of various glass vials. Some of them have been repurposed and taped at the top, but they're functional. He sets them down on the counter. "All "right. I have six potions of healing, and I have three of greater healing, and one superior."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I know how much these things tend to cost?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! This is not a save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, just add your modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The uncommon ones can range somewhere in the 500 gold pieces range. The superior, however, are much rarer to come by, and the fact he even has one, with how recently you guys cleared him out, it's pretty decent. That one can run anywhere between 4,000-5,000 gold pieces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it's six, three, and one? Is that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six, three, and one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to get them? It seems like you got all the money in the world.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can heal myself just fine, but I don't know about your friends-- do they have healing abilities?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, not-- well they do, they touch you with their hand and then like all of a sudden it feels a bit better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A bit better?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I don't really know how that works.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they use potions. I've seen them use potions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm normally pouring them in their mouths.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think they would appreciate these?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As a (mumbling) new member of Vox Machina--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bad allergies here. It could be like a really great gift, you know? Like Keyleth gave you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- welcome-me-to-the-gang gift.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you gift-wrap, here, sir?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For an additional charge, yes, of course, I gift wrap!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- of course for an additional charge. What if we took the whole lot of those for 6,000 gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The whole lot? For 6,000. I'm afraid that is far under the price I'd be considering. Let me "see here." And he does some kind of notations, and he goes, "Hm. You seem, from our previous "experience, to be quite the bargainer, my friend."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the brains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How would you say to the fair price of 10,000 gold pieces for the batch?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let me confer with my partner. (whispers) How many on your hands is that? Yeah, no-- both hands, how many?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's too much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Too much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. This man is insulting your intelligence, and you should be very angry right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about 9,000 gold pieces?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mm, you drive a very hard bargain, my big friend, however! Because it's you? Deal."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Done! Pay the man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would object to this. This is coming out of my purse, and I insist that you negotiate with me, and not--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary, this man drives a really well-known establishment. If we leave here, after having struck that bargain, and we don't pay? There will be more guards outside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gulps) How about this. I can trade you something worth far more than the extra 3,000 gold this gentleman promised you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What would this be?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a rare egg. Magical in nature. It can save a life, in any situation. And if you eat it when you are nearly dead, you will go back into battle with the strength and bravery of ten men, and you will not rest until your foes are dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check. This isn't deception because you believe this wholeheartedly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this deception or persuasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is persuasion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "6,000 and the egg, you say? Very well." He pushes the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Gentle!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will be." He goes over and quickly reaches over and grabs a thick towel-like pile of cloth, and wraps it up carefully. "Ooh." Sets it down. "A pleasure doing business with you all."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah-ah-ah. The gift-wrapping? (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Terribly sorry. My apologies. I'll be right to it." And he turns and leaves the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary, that was a personal gift from me to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but we're partners, as you just said, and I felt that you would approve of me doing so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I suppose I am a bit proud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (loud clanging)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear behind you guys in the doorway--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit. Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- some of the impacts of metal, rapidly and heavily.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sword!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh Jesus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you glance behind and you see, walking through the doorway, the very heavy, hulking figure of Doty, carrying two unconscious guards that are hanging from his hands.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you do? Give me those! I punch them both, one time each, in the jaw, just for extra measure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Both jaws are very broken.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody's going to die, all right? So we're going to kill everyone that we see in the next ten seconds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're killing them? Even the shop owner?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, he's got to die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit. All right. Partners, right? I'll do whatever you say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a counter in the shop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there's a counter in the front area.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it wooden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can he see through the counter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the proprietor is in the back room. He's wrapping your stuff right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He doesn't know this happened. Let's get rid of them. Get rid of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, what's in the shop? Is there a tapestry, is there a rug?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a very big-- There is a secondary room to the side where it looks like there is an upper platform, but that looks like where his bedroom is, maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a couple of lanterns, it's a warm-lit interior, and as you're looking around, it's not a huge establishment. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea! You're panicking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I saw this in a tavern once. Let's sit them up like they're just sleeping and nobody will notice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They have jaws-- the blood! Their jaws are terrible!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, didn't you put a mask on Dotty? Let's do it again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't! I don't have extra masks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it will be no problem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can put them somewhere else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I sit one up in the corner, and I sit the other one, and lean it on his shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god. What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is great. Don't worry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even I can tell that those are two--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have an even better idea! I take the cask of ale out of the bag of holding, and I just start pouring ale all over them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would they be in here drinking? They're guards on duty!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now I need you to vomit on them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't vomit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it right now. Put your finger down your throat and puke on these guards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 17! Puke on those fucking guards!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vomit on those bitches.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (dry heaving)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One second! One second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm really sorry. These two gentlemen obviously have been off their ass. They came in here, smelling of booze, looking for something to make them feel better, I don't know, and they just passed out in the corner. Is there someone you know that we can call? I really hate just leaving them here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. Come on, Grog!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Please a four.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He slowly hands out this really nice bundle, and it has a little bow on it and it's wrapped, and he hands it out to you and just goes, "Please, take this and never come back. Please."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For the rest of the day?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ever again. Your presence has brought me no end of pain. Just go."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obviously, we've gotten the better end of this deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that that is true, absolutely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you still have the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should go. We should leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Thank you for your--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (incoherent noises)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good day to you. Let's go. Doty, come.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bidet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doty turns. "Ahh!" And comes running after you guys as you exit the shop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was amazing. I don't feel good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know. A drink?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Is there a tavern near this shop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the Quad Roads? Yeah. There's actually quite a few taverns.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where was that? What the fuck?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. It just comes naturally. I can't force it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can't perform on command? I needed you. Okay, you got more in there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just a one-er?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe a little.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (barfs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. That looks like Lucky Charms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. While you guys get a drink, we're going to get a quick bathroom break. We have a couple more beats we want to get through before the night's end. We're not going to go too long, trust me. But we're going to take a quick bathroom break, and then we'll come back here in a few minutes. We do have one more giveaway here tonight from our awesome friends at Wyrmwood. We have a dice box here, signed by the cast of Critical Role. It is a birch dice box. Do we have a code for the chat room?

lines.name: CREW
lines.text: Wyrmwood!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wyrmwood. Go ahead and use, one word, Wyrmwood, in the chat room on Twitch. We'll have a break, and we'll have a winner announced for you when we get back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wyrmwood with a 'y'.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 'OnlyTwentiesAllowed'. Great name, by the way. You won the contest for this week. We're going to go ahead and get your information, and send you your Wyrmwood box. Thank you again, Wyrmwood, for sending that so we can get that to you guys for free as the contest weekly. Back into the story we were. So, you guys are drinking and laying low.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys were making your way to the library, you said?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to finish up and try and get out, I guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would also like to definitely talk about maybe having access later, to come back at some point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We want to talk to Kusuo and see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just on our way out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the way out, as the tomes are placed and locked back up, you talk to Kusuo. "That is not a "worry. Just make sure that you request me when you arrive."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It would be my pleasure."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you so much. And I hope that that book finds a proper home and is worthwhile. Thank you for your time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you. And would it be possible if we bring friends of ours in the future who are--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of our group.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, who are fluent in these languages.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course. Just make sure that you accompany them."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leads you out. You guys exit the library just as Vax and Vex, after finding information on where to go, arrive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys have the book?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We totally do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know-- I thought-- You know, I think-- I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you find?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, some good stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It actually went quite well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We found one book that we could read, and one book that we couldn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because it was all written in Abyssal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can read that!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! Because your father forced you to do things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't they all. Speaking of fathers forcing you to do things, we have to deal with you. We have a starting point for the rakshasa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wonderful.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So, soon, when it's time, step one will be the City of Dis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The City of Dis?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dis City. Not this city, but the City of Dis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We built Dis city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you build Dis city?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On rock'n'roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I have that book please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yes! Hi. Yes, this is-- Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just going to hold on to that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you going to hold on-- Do we have a bag to put that in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have Grog's bag of holding, the same one we've always had. Hey, is there somewhere we could buy a fucking bag of holding?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're kind of rare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not expensive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To Grog, they're rare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you could ask around and try to find somebody. It'll take a little time. You guys are right now hitting the cusp of dawn. Sorry, dusk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there somewhere I could find before things close? Just to see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, balls. That's terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to find one location, but it's been closed for half an hour when you get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck! Fuck. Fine. It's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's in Los Angeles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pittsburgh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pittsburgh, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about we go see your dad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs nervously)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we tabling the book, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to drop it off, I think.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did you guys find out? Is it a good spot, a good home for it? Do you want to drop it off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They definitely are interested in it at the Platinum Sanctuary.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little too interested for my taste.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You think?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. I don't want this book in anyone's hands, frankly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were very interested in researching it. Which I don't think is a bad thing. They're good people. And learning about history is a good way to keep yourself from repeating it. However, you do serve the Raven Queen, who I know wants nothing to do with the undead. And if it means destroying this book, then do what needs to be done.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we destroy this book?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seems like a pretty powerful book.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The fear I have with the book is of course if we keep it, we keep it out of the hands of everyone, save those who are finally strong enough to best us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want this book to travel to hell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it might not be a bad-- I mean, we did drop off the horn of Orcus here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll tell you what. Why don't you guys get everything set to go, and I will drop this off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Where? There? Where?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh. Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it'll be fine. It'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to go back to the temple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a terrible idea. I kind of like it. That's not a good thing. I think it's a good idea. That may not be a good thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to come with me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hook him by the arm and we just start off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Find a bar!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll get things packed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was my idea! Go fuck yourself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Love you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dresses? Oh, everything's fucking closed!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh goddamnit, Pittsburgh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there dress shops open? At all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This ain't New York City.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just want pretty dresses. Oh! Oh! Oh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get it, girl. Get it, get it, girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to find one individual who is in the process of closing their formal attire shop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I toss them 20 gold. An extra 20 minutes, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course! Come on in."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah! Everything's better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's good for your Ashari people? Something covered in grass, maybe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Turf? Astro-turf?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A little experimental. A little Gaga-esque.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lots of pink bows, maybe, for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, it reminds a little of when we dressed Trinket up in pink bows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, and we could be like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if that's a good thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Help us. Make us pretty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make us pretty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And very expensive looking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to become royalty. Kind of, but not really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's my first time getting to dress up as royalty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. That-- Okay." The gentleman seems a bit overwhelmed, but quickly goes ahead and helps you guys find, over the next 30 or so minutes, some very nice dresses. Better than anything you've previously worn. And he gets you something that he thinks royalty should wear. As there is no real royalty in Vasselheim, it is a church-run state. It is more of a frumpy robe with a fur collar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vex, this collar is so big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is terrible. Give her something flowy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why can't I see over it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Flowy. Of course. I'm so sorry. Flowy, yes." He's starting to get a little impatient, but does manage to pull one very nice simple gown, that just hangs off the shoulders and pools on the ground around you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In all the colors. Can it be in all the colors?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can we dip-dye it blue?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dye? I could have it dyed. That would be by tomorrow morning prepared."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, I'll get it taken care of."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. While that's happening, you two are heading to the Raven's Crest?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you guys walk over to the Dusk Meadow. You're met by the same gray, slightly bleak atmosphere on this side of Vasselheim. But you make your way to the exterior of the large structure. The ominous obsidian and gold building that represents the center, if you will, the beating heart of the Raven Queen's worship. As you approach the front stairway, both of you familiar with, one brought in, the other not met with any living person for the most part in your journey, you both approach-- still arms hooked?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I suspect you've been here before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) I like that things are better between you and I now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel the same. I like that most things are better now. Not everything, but it's a brighter world, even for us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know what I like? I like the version of you that my sister brings out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do too. I'll do my best to keep him in the forefront. And as for you: I like the version of you that's not afraid. So let's go meet this terrible thing, drop off the book, get you feeling a bit better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (clears throat) Come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck. (clears throat)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, standing as the doors open, is what looks to be an older woman wearing the same attire, the same dark veil, somewhat able to see her features beneath the dark material that hangs in front of her. She steps forward as the doors open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hello there. You recognize me. This is my friend. We bring you an offering for the Queen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The woman bends down, takes the tome from your hand. She holds it, she takes her fingers and brushes the cloth away that currently obscures the tome, takes a look at it, holds it a foot further away from her face, and throws the cloth over the front, clasps it in her arms and brings it down towards her torso. And, for the first time since this-- you've heard her speak before, you have done this before-- but the strange eerie kind of airy whisper comes out from this older woman as she bends forward, clutching this tome. "We thank you. And we will be sure that this finds its final seal."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She has begun to speak to me. Her desires are not clear, entirely, but I am listening. And I intend to learn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to go. But I mean to come back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The center of all other life and death. Be watchful. Be vigilant." She bows, and backs into the Raven's Crest once more as the doors close, the two other women now flanking out of the shadows and stepping before each door, and seemingly just not paying attention to your presence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was envious of you once. God. So sorry. (sighs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) Good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They make no response as you guys turn and make your way down the stairs from the Raven's Crest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just so you know, it is your duty to have some joy in the meantime. You do know that, right? You're no use to her a wreck. She needs a man. Have a fucking beer. And I slap him on the ass as we walk towards the pub.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look over my shoulder at the temple as we walk. Come on, let's get drunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your head moves forward, walking, you feel this cold tingle just drift down the back of your neck and spine, then it fades, and you keep walking, carrying on your chest there a brief, warm secondary heartbeat representing the brief boon granted upon you by the Raven Queen. You catch up with the ladies at the bar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: (laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs)
