lines.text: You bet your ass you do, that's a 20!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I roll an insight check? That's bullshit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's no fucking way!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, go ahead and make an insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Oh, bullshit. That was the most bullshit delivery.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, can I try? Can I try too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm never gonna roll that high again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Please, save us from this moral dilemma!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm, mm, 21!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are the first person not to believe Grog's story.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (quietly) Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we need to make sure you're with an adult from here on out? Can you not be trusted alone with Tary?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you buy potions?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have quite a gift for you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For all of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no! Do not! Do not be influenced by his very generous act of kindness! That was so kind of you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you'll find something for everyone in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a little bit of vomit on there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a little. Spatter. It's dried by now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was like 6,000 gold worth of-- But do not! Don't!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this blood on the-- yep--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that's vomit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are skipping past the fact that two men are dead right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we need to go and find them? And try to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to go find these dead guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you sure they're dead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot where I left them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is upsetting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know where they are, but the situation was fluid, and it was fast-moving. And we acted on our best instincts and our best judgment, and mistakes were made.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Mm-hm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tary, it sounds like all of the opposite of that is true.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you're an adventurer--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Except for mistakes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Except for the mistakes part, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When you're an adventurer, you have to learn to live with a certain amount of bloodshed around you, and I think what Greg has told me today--what he has taught me was to toughen me up. And I appreciate him for that and I appreciate the lesson. And I appreciate you all for sending me out with him, knowing full well that that would happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't kill people in cities! Don't kill people!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I still haven't-- I-- okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't kill people!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who killed anybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You didn't kill anyone, did you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course he did, he looked us in the eye and he said he killed two people! We should go find them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. They're dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't believe him. Can I roll an insight check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whose vomit was this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I believe him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I believe him so good! 11!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This game is a nightmare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog fucking killed two people!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God! Grog!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, I was trying to protect our new friend here. It had to be done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where was this place? Where was this place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, we're never going to be able to come back to Vasselheim!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to find these two men and bring them to a temple or something, we can't just leave them--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was a potion seller, it was a medicinal, herbalist or something--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you guide me there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, you did not go to that guy, the guy who-- oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you go to that guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It seems to be--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He did say he wanted to see the twins, especially.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is not--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, listen, take me to this place. You and I will carry these men to a temple.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And do what? What they did to you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We will-- what happened to me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you were revived, from death.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I can't do that. And you can't do that, so we need to take these men to a temple where somebody can help them!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, God, look, fine, they're not dead!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't believe you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sighs) No, I just knocked the life out of them, but they're not dead, right, wiretapping does not mean dead, all right? (all laugh)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was in quotations.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, look, they're fine, they might be covered in beer, we don't really need to go back for them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Insight check!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I don't believe you. You killed them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now you're the fucking boy who cried wolf three times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll insight, both you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God damn it, don't fuck me, Gil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I rolled Gil, too!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, jeez, that wasn't great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got it. I got you covered.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They didn't ask you to roll, Taliesin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you guys get at this point that Grog's been fucking with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You fucking dick!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but seriously, you still attacked the guards, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's still really bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whose vomit is this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So those guys aren't dead, is what you're saying? Those two guys are not dead?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: They're not dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, that's kind of funny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still feel like I would like an answer to the mystery of the vomit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At least Doty was in disguise. No one will recognize him. Just take the disguise off him now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's what I said like five minutes ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take the disguise off of him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That looks like Tary's vomit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How can you tell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I saw him puke under the water and it floated right past me. I got a great view of it. He's a nervous puker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is better in this town? A disgusting mess or a robit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A robit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An automaton.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's necromancy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An ottoman.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I need a drink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pour him a little bit of the Tear Whiskey.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did you guys do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We thought we had a book.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But you don't?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we didn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We left without the book, thinking we had the book, and then we lied about not having the book, but we actually didn't have it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it seems like it might be okay, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got that motherfucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you get it? Yeah! Real-life hero.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two guards alive. That is fucking dead (all laugh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say we get Doty's disguise off of him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say we go to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start peeling it away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we get up in the morning, and we pick up our pretty dresses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we go get you crowned! So we can wear our pretty dresses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keep drinking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything but the hair comes off. The mask, the porcelain, everything else comes off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the cloak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cloak does not come off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not from just tugging it. It's adhered pretty strongly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tary, going forward, I think you need to recognize how literal Doty takes things, and maybe think maybe more detailedly on how you word things, maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty did his job. He protected us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: From innocent guards.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who were going to arrest us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why were they going to arrest you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we were arcanists walking loose in the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not illegal!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was led to believe it was. And I'm a stranger in this land, and they were trailing us, and your cohort over there, the big guy himself, told me that they were a danger to us, and Doty did his job. Listen, you can't blame Doty for the mistakes that I may have made. I take full responsibility for this, and I throw myself at your feet for mercy. I know I'm new to this team, and I hoped that this gift would be a peacemaking gesture. By the way, you should divide all these potions up as you see fit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We totally should.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm sorry if I made mistakes today. But we're all alive, we have what we need, and we're still on an adventure, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A toast to mistakes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's all sing our fight song, shall we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- and to terrible consequences, to failure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about you go first, Tary.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, let's learn it from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Doty, show me what we wrote. (sings) 'Seven intrepid warriors we, were strong before and 'stronger with me. Drinking wine and Heroes' Feasts, saving maidens, defeating beasts. We 'fight, fight, fight, with strength and girth, I slew a marid and proved my worth. Vix and Vox, 'Kiko and Greg, and Percival with the head like an egg. I defeated a kraken too, and I saved the 'Ashari single-handedly in the ocean blue. We fight, fight, fight, with strength and girth. I 'won your hearts and I proved my worth.'

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh. Bravo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now you all have fight songs too, don't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll cover that at the next drink. I think it's time to turn in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hm, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run-- I'm going to get a little bit of the hardest alcohol that they have, preferably a clear alcohol, and ask them if they have any chicken, like-- or some sort of meat that they're about to throw away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Chicken.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stop it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They do have some near-spoiling meat. And at the cost of one gold piece you can get a pretty solid bottle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pop it and I'm just going to try and start solventing away the glue with grease, with fatty grease and alcohol.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll take you the better part of the next couple of hours, but you can do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just going to try and get this thing off. Let me try and remove the hair too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to get the hair off. You don't get all the glue splotches. Doty now has these, like, clusters of nasty-looking glue splotches all over the head. And of like, taken pieces of thread, and fuzz, and dirt and things just from the atmosphere to him. It looks awful. Doty looks awful. But the cloak does come off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll have it cleaned, dear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's amazing. So worth it, darling, I can't believe you did that. Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does the cloak of Elvenkind look like butt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got clumps of red hair stuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only like 10% butt. Like, there is still glue on it. You have to spend more time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It worked?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we take off the mask?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It looks like the kindergarten class attacked it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we take off the mask?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fucker.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: There's another one! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like a hydra, Travis killed one, two more took its place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's so strange man, they go up, they come back down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're huge. Sorry. That was really inappropriate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you guys get tired, you could rent a room for the evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the tavern if you'd like, the Siren's Succor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, let's rent a room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So, I'd say for the rooms for all of you guys tonight, drinking there, mark off ten gold, it's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For everyone, or each.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For everyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For everyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pf.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can take care of this, if you'd like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we got this. It's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got it. It's fine, Tary.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But part of being--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You buy the potions, we pay for the shitty hotel rooms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) I don't know if that evens out. But all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't think of it as a thing that evens out, think of it as an ever-increasing debt that doesn't really ever get paid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like the way you think, science bro.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cheers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Except for Grog, Grog, you're fine. Yay constitution 20! But you guys muster yourselves, get a quick bite to eat downstairs, in the now even-more-empty tavern. Your dresses are at the ready, you go and collect them. What's next, what do you guys want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should go to see your people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we could catch brunch first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. We should go to see. Your. People.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No time like the present.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what are the colors of Whitestone again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lavender, white, blue, gold, silver.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the colors I want my dress to be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might add, you do-- Part of taking a crest is that you actually do get to build something of your own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to work on that, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do. I was-- I feel like I've been negligent. That we've not been--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You also need to explain to me what the fucking Grey Hunt is at some point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, we should get to that. I only know because we've talked about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, let's go, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Antlers upon antlers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And such. With the Transport Via Plants spell cast into the nearest tree, you guys find yourself emerging from one of the cliffside trees that have grown out of the outcropping of stone and rock that marks the exterior of Zephra. Did you all travel here last time, or was it just Keyleth and Vax?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was just Vax and Allura--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Vax. Allura, that's right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (nervous laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, and she was like, "Whatever."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys all emerge, and you see now, on these extremely tall mountain bluffs, the wind is strong on the outskirts, and you can see, whizzing past you, puffs of cloud, and leaf, and dust. But it's all contained on the outside of this bluff. And before you on the opposite side, built deep into this mountain top, you can see dozens and dozens of structures made from the natural stone and bending of long wood slats that seem to have been curved over into these dome-like structures. You see small trees emerging in places, and even though you are a few hundred feet off, you can already see maybe 20 or so various people just wandering the town, some of which are outside working on-- sitting on benches, working on various crafts. You can see leathers being dried out from various hides. You catch the sight of a griffin that swoops past and disappears into a nearby cloud. And looking over the bluff--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- about ten feet off, this is the drop, goes down for hundreds of feet before vanishing into low-hanging clouds. You guys have no idea how high up you are, but it seems very high.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (inhales) Oh man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we falling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it super windy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No no no, we're on the mountain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a lot of wind rushing just around you, but it seems like this portion of the mountain is almost protected, or at least the winds are guided in a way where they're not affecting this portion of the mountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what do we do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happens now, boss?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. See, over there is where I caught my first baby griffin--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- he was lost and got separated from his mom, and I captured him up, and I tucked him up under my shirt. And over there actually--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- I tripped and fell and that was the first time that I scraped my knee--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- and I was like, oh no, I'm bleeding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It must have been terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While she was walking, I go behind and do this to Vax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it was so terrible, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it still hurt?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No it's fine, I feel good. I feel really good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I feel really good. I feel rested. I feel fucking healthy man. I don't know. I'm serious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, that's happy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (growls)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (growls)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are walking closer to the outside of Zephra, you see a couple of individuals beginning to approach, three or four children, just seeing these strange visitors in the outskirts. They're also keeping low and not trying to draw your attention too strongly, though they are out in the middle of the open. You see a few bushes and elements. You see two grown individuals walking up with the children, one of which appears to be a relatively young girl, maybe around 13, 14 years old who pushes the kids to the back and goes, "Keyleth?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, hi, hi. What's your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sora. You used to watch over me when I was little."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my goodness, Sora. Wow, last time I saw you, you were like, like, oh man. Look how big you've gotten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you still know that handshake? Do you remember the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a moment for you guys to figure it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And there, you've got it. You got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's slightly awkward, but for the most part you recall it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm much older now, I don't need to--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You forgot--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're back."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I guess I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have to tell everyone else."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, hey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The kids are all just quietly staring wide-eyed and smiling quietly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sora, Sora. Have you seen my dad around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you want me to get him?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "C'mon, c'mon kids." And takes them by the hand and they all drag the kids off as you guys wait in the outskirts of the city. One of the kids who didn't quite get a hand on this young three-year-old boy who's running behind them stops. Turns and stares at you all, but stares specifically at Grog and is just wide-eyed, going--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eat your vegetables, you'll look like this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now get out of here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just immediately bolts past to catch up with the rest of the crowd.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I believe you just set up a lifetime of unreasonable expectations.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He'll be healthy, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never seen Grog eat a single vegetable--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, fuck those things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- the entire time I've known him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was wondering about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing in green is good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone holds back as he steps forth from the crowd and ignoring the rest of you, just goes and beelines straight to Keyleth. You can see him, he has a bit of a limp to him that you don't recall from last time, but he seems other than that in good health. As he approaches you, he clasps his hands out in front of him and takes a good long look at you as he reaches out and takes your hands into his own. "My daughter."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just drop to a knee and say, Kaitiyaki, father.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kaitiyaki, Keyleth. We've heard that the defense of Emon was successful, yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, we have defeated the Chroma Conclave. The help of Vox Machina and many many others, at the cost of many lives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good, good. I'm glad we could be of some aid to your journey."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, thank you. The Air Ashari were very valuable during that day. Very courageous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And we will remember those we lost in that fray. The great sacrifices that they gave so that "these children could live. So?" And at this point, he now takes notice of the rest of the group. "By "what joy do we have of bringing your allies here and returning to your people?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He doesn't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I thought Uvenda might have said something. I'm here because I have completed my Aramente, and have come for my blessing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, you have."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I just wanted to hear it from your lips."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still waiting on your final word, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are welcome, welcome here in Zephra. We'll begin, decoration shall commence. Rest, prepare, "naught but two or three hours until the ceremony is to occur." He turns, and folks begin to rush in, and people just begin to barrage you with questions and congratulations, and a number of individuals who seem to have heard stories, many second-hand, and exaggerations of the various things that you've accomplished over the past year or so here in Tal'Dorei. You answer questions, you play into the tall tales if you want. One child turns to you and goes, "And who are you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon Darrington.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know who you are."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a massive interest around Grog as goliaths generally do not travel this far up into the territory of the mountain. Most of them stay far north in the Cliffkeep or wandering the dividing plain. They're just swarming you and climbing up on you and hanging from your arms and you feel kind of awkward but kind of enjoying the attention at the same time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're really little.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kind of like gnomes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. (gasps) (all laugh)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well that works, well done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, it seems that they have returned and the decor is set, benches have been moved, and most of the people of Zephra are now shifting in the direction of this tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In all the hubbub and the movement, a few moments before, I've been watching for Korren, and when I see him alone for a second, I make a beeline toward him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's in the process of a conversation. And it's interesting. During this whole thing, he was excited to see you and that you've come, but he's also-- he's kept a strange distance from you during this preparation. He smiles, and you guys meet eyes occasionally, but he's also just focusing on this endeavor, and then you kind of come out of the blue. "Ah, yes, Vax'ildan."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forgive me. Might I have just a moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Quickly. We're about to begin, but yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's going to do your people very proud. I'm grateful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As are we all."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've a lot to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As do you. As does she." And he reaches out and pats you on the head and ruffles your hair a little bit. And even that feels a little awkward for him, like he felt impulsive to do it, and then 'oh, that wasn't very-- mm.'

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's all right. It's more than I ever got.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa. Ow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rushing, perpetual gust of air seems to almost hold its breath for this. He clears his throat. And as he looks up to everyone, you swear this tree begins to slowly produce cherry blossoms as his words continue. "For long, we of the winds have awaited the procession of our "tradition. With the passing of our elder voice, Dwala, it was my wife Vilya who was selected to "take the Aramente. Beautiful and full of determination, she accepted her path. And while "she did not return to us, the destiny she set is now seen as one of preparation. Her journey was "not in vain, for it was her love that produced our daughter. It was her guidance in joy that taught "our child compassion. It was her discipline and understanding that forged young Keyleth's spark of "intuition and unlocked her adept connection with nature and the winds. We mourn the loss of our "Vilya, but take pride that she lives on in the eyes of our own, returned, beloved woman of the "winds. Here we bring together our collective voices to bless upon my daughter, the memory of "Vilya, the champion of Guasar, the mantle of our destiny." And as he puts his arms up, from around you to each side, Keyleth, you watch as young acolytes begin to approach from each side, arms down. All seemingly carrying these various pieces of dark green, leather-like material. And as they come together, they latch them into place and slowly build this mantle. "Ring clear our voices "to unite our breath and grant our strength to her guidance and wisdom, as Keyleth takes the rightful "and earned responsibility of leading our people into this next generation." At this point, the assembled mantle is placed into Korren's arms. And you now see this beautiful neck and shoulder piece that rests past to the elbows, but limp and without body, in his hands. As he holds it there and the rest of the acolytes step back and find their place, seated, he lifts his arms up a bit and begins to just sing a singular note (sings). And everyone around you in Zephra begins to join in in this singular note. Do you choose to join in as well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do, the notes begin to separate and harmonize instinctually. It creates this symphony, this beautiful tangling of hundreds of voices from all across the spectrum. And what at first may seem to resemble a discordant hymn, finds this perfect spread of every note you've ever heard, musically merging as one. As he does this, instinctually, Keyleth, without even thinking, you rise and begin to walk towards him. Like the spirits of generations before you are lifting you by your shoulders and elbows, and bring you up before your father. You find the breath leave your lungs, the inside of your mouth is dry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually the cloak stops. The voices soften, and come to silence, as you look up once more into your father's face. "Rise, my daughter, and become "Keyleth, Voice of the Tempest." He steps back and bows his head. Steps off the platform. And you stand and turn, and it's just you at the base of tree, looking about at all of Zephra before you, quiet, silent. And your friends before you, at the front of the crowd.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Didn't think I'd make it here. I couldn't have done any of this without not only the support of every person in Zephra, and every person of the Ashari tribe, members of Emon, Tal'Dorei, Marquet, even Wildmount. In my journeys, I've learned being a leader is a global effort, one that takes the wisdom of many. Most importantly, I couldn't have done any of this without Vox Machina. And the pieces of them that I've taken away and have desperately tried to emulate in each one of them over the years. Each one of them with qualities that I admire and strive to embrace. Grog, with his strength and his unyielding loyalty. Vex, with her self-confidence and utter fearlessness. Vax is one of the most compassionate people I think I've ever come across and one of the most brave, even if it's maybe foolish. Percival, with your intelligence and your sensibility, is always there to be my balance. Scanlan, with his charisma and his wit. Pike--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wherever she is, a part of her is watching.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, her generosity and her authenticity, always true to herself. And even Tary. Taryon Darrington, whose blind faith in Vox Machina and perseverance, trusted us even though he probably shouldn't have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) You're incredible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All of these things that I learned and couldn't be a leader without. Vox Machina makes up me. Zephra makes up me. The Ashari people, and all of greater Exandria. I don't know if I'm the leader that you deserve, or a good leader, but I'm willing to dedicate the rest of my life to doing whatever I can for all of us. As long as Vox Machina stands by my side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look around and watch the rest of these blossoms slowly drift. You look and see your friends around you. You look around and you see your mother, out of the corner of your eye, just the memory of her. You sense that if she could be here, she would've been. Your father steps up and takes your hands and just says, "I'm so proud of "you. And there's much to be done, I know, but I'm proud of you." And he takes your hand, and holds it up once more. "To the Voice of the Tempest. And the future of our people." Everyone cheers once more together.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To Vox Tempesta! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, you gain the Inspiring Leader feat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? I get the what now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Inspiring Leader feat, as the end of your Aramente.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit, Voice of the Tempest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which is pretty fun. What that allows you to do is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can never die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you can totally die. You can spend ten minutes inspiring your companions, shoring up their resolve to fight. When you do so, choose up to six friendly creatures, which can include yourself, within 30 feet that can hear and understand you. Each creature can gain temporary hit points equal to your level plus your charisma modifier.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, what! Well, you guys are out of luck with the charisma modifier shit, but what! (all laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And they can only gain the temporary hit points from this until they finish a short or long rest. So every short rest you can give everyone 17 temporary hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is fucking dope!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to give a speech every time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, you take ten minutes to talk everybody up. So start practicing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jeez, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we'll leave it there for the evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was gorgeous, man. That was gorgeous.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With the tree, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was awesome. Completed your Aramente, took up the mantle, and, apparently, going to the Iron City of Dis soon. That's going to be fun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) We built this-- No, no more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No more of Dis City.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I came up with great formal wear for you, too. It's a shame we didn't get a chance. I figured you out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grog has a very discerning taste.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very proud I came up with an idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm glad we went with the blue dress after that cape turned all the other colors of nature and it's like, you are covered.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (all laugh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Covered, girl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys. Thank you again, Loot Crate, for being our awesome sponsor.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Loot Crate!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Matt, you did a great job.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are always such an absolute pleasure. Thank you for playing in my weird make-up world.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long have you been working on that speech, man? That was nuts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that was fun. I've been waiting for everybody to get to that moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Improv-ed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glad you survived to get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Died in Stillben, game three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And send out the next one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (all cheer)
